channel.title: Help i have a multi login block i wanna remove it
channel.description: I have something the blocks multiple ppl from logging on from one ip i wanna remove it help plz :confused:

item.title: Help i have a multi login block i wanna remove it
item.dc:creator: @i_pked_ya i pked ya
item.description:
@i_pked_ya wrote:

[quote=“the1337legend, post:2, topic:283199”]in ur client.java folders or w.e in ur server search:
for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){
and then u should hopeflly maybe see something like “Uncomment this to allow multi adresses”
alls what u need to do is hit enter for a new line before and after the statements and type /* and then after is */ e.g this is mine.

Thank You so much

// uncomment this code below to stop multiple logins from 1
// computer.

		/*
		  for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){
		  Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(p != null &&
		  !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) &&
		  playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost") && !checkLog("connect", connectedFrom)){
		  sM("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected =
		  true; return; } }
		*/[/quote]

Thank You so much!!!

Read full topic
item.source: Help i have a multi login block i wanna remove it

item.title: Help i have a multi login block i wanna remove it
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

in ur client.java folders or w.e in ur server search:
for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){
and then u should hopeflly maybe see something like “Uncomment this to allow multi adresses”
alls what u need to do is hit enter for a new line before and after the statements and type /* and then after is */ e.g this is mine.

// uncomment this code below to stop multiple logins from 1
// computer.

		/*
		  for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){
		  Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(p != null &&
		  !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) &&
		  playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost") && !checkLog("connect", connectedFrom)){
		  sM("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected =
		  true; return; } }
		*/

Read full topic
item.source: Help i have a multi login block i wanna remove it
